snippet.title: Rogue Voltage - The Engineering Roguelike - Early Access Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Rogue Voltage is the engineering roguelike.

Construct your own skills by wiring circuits. Build crazy machines to zap the monsters and trigger satisfying chain reactions. Manipulate the timeline and try to get the power back on in a world in which time is out of joint. Rogue Voltage's unique wiring game mechanics are a novel twist on roguelike deckbuilder genre.

Rogue Voltage is OUT NOW in Early Access (93% positive on Steam): https://s.team/a/1494560 

Twitter: https://twitter.com/_RogueVoltage
Come nerd out with us: https://discord.gg/bGpnfJFUPj

#roguelike  #rpg  #indiegame  #gaming  #trailer  #steam  #jrpg  #modularsynth
